alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 15 at 11:34AM MST until December 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting 35 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Carter, Custer, Fallon, and Powder River. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel is seriously discouraged in the warned area, especially tonight. Visibility will be below a quarter mile at times in blowing and falling snow. Severe drifting may shut roads in, especially in rural areas. Northwest winds gusting 35 to 50 mph will make travel very difficult for high profile vehicles especially where roads are slick and snow covered.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely dangerous.
